SELECT SEQ_FAQ, FAQC_TYP, INQUIRY, ANSWER, RECODE_ST, SORT_NO FROM ( SELECT SEQ_FAQ, FAQC_TYP, INQUIRY, ANSWER, RECODE_ST, SORT_NO FROM T_FAQ
WHERE FAQC_TYP = '01'
WHERE FAQC_TYP = #faq_typ#
AND RECODE_ST = #sel_recode#
) T
WHERE (INQUIRY LIKE '%'||#sTxt#||'%') OR (ANSWER LIKE '%'||#sTxt#||'%')
ORDER BY SORT_NO
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_FAQ SET SORT_NO = TO_NUMBER(#sort_no#) where FAQC_TYP=#faq_typ# AND SEQ_FAQ = #seq#
